author: Cat Ellis
title: Facebook is struggling to keep running under 'unprecedented' demand
description: People in isolation are flocking to the social network to keep in touch with friends and loved ones.
content:
Facebook is trembling under the weight of traffic, as people around the world turn to the app to keep in touch with friends and family during the coronavirus pandemic.
So far the social network as managed to stay up and running, but has dialled back video qu… [+3032 chars]
